body.description: Amazon Brand - Mama Bear Infant Feeding Wide-Neck Baby Bottle with Slow Flow Nipple, BPA Free, 9 oz (Pack of 3), Baby is comfortably able to complete feedings and Nipple is designed to help vent bottle to reduce air in feedings

productInformation.name: Safety warning
productInformation.value: ‎For your child’s safety and health, WARNING! Always use this product with adult supervision. Never use feeding nipples as a pacifier. Continuous and prolonged sucking of fluids will cause tooth decay. Always check food temperature beforefeeding. Always check the nipples for signs of wear and replace when damaged. Do not use a microwave oven to heat the bottle because microwave ovens can create hotspots in milk/formula orbottle components. The components of this bottle are not toys and should not be given to children to play with or suck on. Do not leave the product in direct sunlight or heat or leave in disinfectant (sterilizing solution) for longer than recommended, as this may weaken the nipple. Change nipples after approximately 6 weeks of use. When used and sterilized intensively, nipples may deteriorate after 6 weeks. Do not allow a child to walk or run while using this bottle. CAUTION: Remove the bottle from your baby’s mouth when the baby is not feeding. Do not let a child take a bottle to bed or self-feed for long periods. Prolonged contact with milk, formula, and other liquids can cause tooth decay. Allowing your child to use this product for prolonged periods separate from regular mealtimes or to go to sleep while drinking liquids, other than water, from this baby bottle may cause or contribute to early childhood tooth decay. Be sure to contact your physician should you have any feeding problems or questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to hold
reviews.reviewText: My baby girl loves her babas and I will order more. They’re easy to clean and super easy for her to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Replacement for Playtex
reviews.reviewText: After 3 generations of using Playtex bottles with liners, Playtex decided to stop manufacturing the liners. Playtex was the only bottle we could use for my grandson that he didn't immediately throw up every single feeding. Went to order more drop ins last month only to find out they stopped making them. We have tried so many anti colic bottles in 10 months that I didn't have much hope for these Momma Bear bottles. I have been pleasantly surprised by them. My grandson took to them right away and no vomiting after a bottle. The only downside that we've encountered is the ring. You really have to screw that thing on tight or a 10 month old will get it and the nipple right off. Other than that the bottle holds up well. I toss them in the dishwasher without problems and my grandson chucks them across the room without breakage or leakage. Much better quality and price than the Walmart brand and Nuk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not work on maam bottles
reviews.reviewText: I put these in my twins maam bottles,they fit good but after a while of use,leak like crazy. My twins were able to push them inwards and leak the bottle all over the place. Other than that,they are very nice quality and price wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work with spectra
reviews.reviewText: I had read reviews that these nipples were compatible with the spectra bottles.They are compatible but the nipple constantly collapses. It’s very thin. And does not appear to be made well. Super disappointed. Also not eligible for Return you have to call in number for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor nipple design
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try these for my son, they look almost identical to the avent bottles he was using.. Cute design, but the nipple collapses every time. 😭

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We needed another bottle for our baby since our old Avent nipples needed to be replaced. I’m so glad I found these, our baby has an easy time drinking from them. The nipples are also interchangeable with our old Avent bottles, which is a plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best baby bottle
reviews.reviewText: My baby love this bottle she drinks a lot more formula when I feed her from this bottle first time ordering this bottle and it’s very nice this nippy well made very soft I love the shape of the nippy this bottle is going to be the #1 seller I love it so much I put a next set in my cart to order my baby love feeding from it good just to the person/persons who made this product 🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾
